Title: Lasting Repairs
Description:
With my Stormriders... inactive, Dornogal is undefended, save a handful of lay peacekeepers. If the nerubians attack us here again, Dornogal will fall--and all of us with it.

It is imperative we draw them away from the city and take out their commander. 

We can and will make our own web and capture Zirix in it.

I have a plan.
ObjectivesText: Discuss the plan to attack the nerubians with Baelgrim.
CompletionText: We cannot remain on the defense.
RewardText:
Then it is settled.

We will make our stand at the Cinderbrew Meadery.

Objectives.Text: Discuss the plan to fight the nerubians
